intro: Take the survey to help us personalize the box according to your preferences.
quiz.complete.heading: Thank you for completing the quiz!
quiz.complete.body: Make sure that you have entered the answers right, so you can get the best experience with our mystery box.
use.makeup: How often do you use makeup?
natural.adventurous.makeup: Do you use more natural makeup or are you open to something more adventurous?
not.favorite.colors: What are the colors you DON'T want to receive in your box? (Choose up to 3.)
dog.cat: Are you a dog person or a cat person?
coffee.tea: Do you prefer coffee or tea?
favorite.prints: Which of these prints do you like? (Choose as many as you like.)
not.favorite.prints: Which of these prints you DON'T want to receive in your box? (Choose up to 2.)
clothing.size: What clothing size you usually wear?
enter.name: Enter your name and surname
confirmation.link.sent: Confirmation link has been sent! Please check your inbox and click the link in order to verify your account
submit.register.details: Submit your details in order to finish the process
register.complete.heading: Thank you for registering on our service
register.complete.body: We are preparing your mistery box
